byline.contributor: Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Washington.

abstract: Iran's navy carries out practice attack on scale mock-up of American aircraft carrier near strategic Strait of Hormuz, which Iran has threatened to close in event of attack on its nuclear sites; exercise is intended as reminder of Iran's military power, even as it is engaged in diplomatic talks with United States.
lead_paragraph: The movie-style attack near the Strait of Hormuz appeared to be a show of might and an expression of displeasure at the American presence in the region.

headline.main: Iran’s Navy Blasts Away at a Mock U.S. Carrier
headline.print_headline: Iran’s Navy Blasts Away at a Mock U.S. Carrier

snippet: The movie-style attack near the Strait of Hormuz appeared to be a show of might and an expression of displeasure at the American presence in the region.
